---

title:  "NSW abandons council amalgamations in policy backflip"
date: 2017-07-27 02:26:03Z
categories: abc-top-stories
---

![NSW abandons council amalgamations in policy backflip](http://www.abc.net.au/news/image/4991420-1x1-700x700.jpg)

The NSW Government announces an end to forced council amalgamations after an 18-month war with the state's local municipalities, although those that have already merged will stay that way.


Full story on F3News: [NSW abandons council amalgamations in policy backflip](http://www.f3nws.com/n/pQdgPC)
